TextEng: We'll be all right. Bad things don't happen to our class of people.
Text: 괜찮을 거야. 우리 같은 신분의 사람들에게 나쁜 일이 생기진 않아.

TextEng: Ah, yes, hello there. I am, eh, Hemmel Masterson. This is my wife Agnes, and our manservent Morden.
Text: 아, 그래, 안녕하시오. 나는, 에, 헴멜 마스터슨이오. 이쪽은 내 아내 아그네스, 그리고 하인 모던이오.

TextEng: I wonder, by chance, if you've seen a man named Callik? He has an amulet of mine and he, ah, seems to have forgotten us.
Text: 혹시 칼릭이라는 남자를 본 적 있소? 내 호신부를 가지고 있는데, 아, 우릴 잊은 것 같소.

TextEng: I'm quite aware of what you said, my dear. Now, if you will just let me speak to this nice <man/woman>.
Text: 당신이 뭐라고 했는지 잘 알고 있소, 여보. 자, 이 친절한 <man/woman>과 얘기 좀 하게 해주오.

TextEng: Well, it's embarrassing. You see, we were led to believe that passage out of Neverwinter could be had here. We were fleeing the quarantine.
Text: 음, 창피한 일이오. 그러니까, 여기서 네버윈터를 빠져나갈 수 있다고 들었소. 격리를 피해 도망치던 참이었소.

TextEng: I arranged for transport that would leave from the docks. I traded an heirloom amulet to a man who swore he was honest.
Text: 부두에서 출발할 운송편을 마련했소. 정직하다고 맹세한 남자에게 가보 호신부를 건넸소.

TextEng: A strapping gent. Callik was his name. He said he was soon to come into his own ship.
Text: 건장한 신사였소. 이름이 칼릭이었소. 곧 자기 배가 생길 거라고 하더군.

TextEng: My dear, he seemed honest enough. He may yet return. It has only been... a day...
Text: 여보, 충분히 정직해 보였소. 아직 돌아올지도 모르오. 겨우... 하루밖에...

TextEng: That amulet was a valuable heirloom. It was a high price, but for the safety of my loved ones, I decided not to quibble.
Text: 그 호신부는 귀중한 가보였소. 비싼 대가였지만, 가족의 안전을 위해 따지지 않기로 했소.

TextEng: Nothing is proven, dear. Still, I would like assurances. It was a valuable amulet, after all. Passed down by my forefathers.
Text: 아직 확실한 건 없소, 여보. 그래도 확인을 받고 싶소. 어쨌든 귀중한 호신부니까. 조상 대대로 전해 내려온 것이오.

TextEng: I don't expect someone like you to understand. That amulet was a valuable heirloom. It was a sacrifice, but I was concerned for my family.
Text: 당신 같은 사람이 이해하리라 기대하지 않소. 그 호신부는 귀중한 가보였소. 희생이었지만, 가족이 걱정됐소.

TextEng: Eh, yes, very well. Goodbye. We'll just... wait here for mister Callik then. Yes. That's what we'll do.
Text: 에, 그래, 알겠소. 안녕히. 그럼 우린 그냥... 여기서 칼릭 씨를 기다리겠소. 그래. 그렇게 하겠소.

TextEng: My dear, do shut up.
Text: 여보, 좀 조용히 해주오.

TextEng: Hello again, <CUSTOM400>. I hope you have good news for me? I've seen no sign of Callik or my amulet.
Text: 다시 만났군, <CUSTOM400>. 좋은 소식이 있기를 바라오. 칼릭도 내 호신부도 흔적이 없소.

TextEng: Well, I should perhaps say that its value is primarily sentimental. It has been on our mantel for generations.
Text: 음, 그 가치는 주로 감상적인 것이라고 해야겠소. 여러 세대 동안 우리 벽난로 위에 있었소.

TextEng: Well, I suppose the thing has some other uses, but it's been years since a Masterson has stooped to dungeon delving.
Text: 음, 다른 용도도 있겠지만, 마스터슨 가문 사람이 던전 탐험 같은 짓을 한 지 몇 년이 됐소.

TextEng: I would be most appreciative if you could. Mr Callik does appear to be... taking an inordinate amount of time.
Text: 그래 주신다면 대단히 감사하겠소. 칼릭 씨가... 너무 오래 걸리는 것 같소.

TextEng: Not to strain your limited faculties, but I would appreciate your assistance. Mr Callik does seem to be... taking his time.
Text: 당신의 모자란 머리에 무리가 갈 수 있겠지만, 도움을 주시면 감사하겠소. 칼릭 씨가... 시간을 끄는 것 같소.

TextEng: He said he would ready a ship, but when he left he went inland. He did drop some sort of auction notice.
Text: 배를 준비하겠다고 했는데, 떠날 때 내륙 쪽으로 갔소. 경매 공지 같은 걸 떨어뜨리더군.

TextEng: You've probably got one already, knowing the area as you must. It doesn't do me much good... I'm a stranger here.
Text: 이 지역을 잘 아실 테니 이미 하나 있겠지요. 나한텐 별 쓸모가 없소... 여긴 처음이오.

TextEng: Here, you can have it. I'm not familiar with the area so it does me no good anyway.
Text: 여기, 가지시오. 이 지역을 잘 모르니 어차피 나한텐 쓸모없소.

TextEng: Please, return my amulet if you find it. It will have the Masterson crest. I've given up on breaking quarantine; I just want back what's mine.
Text: 제발, 호신부를 찾으면 돌려주시오. 마스터슨 가문의 문장이 있을 거요. 격리를 뚫는 건 포기했소. 그냥 내 것을 되찾고 싶소.

TextEng: Are you with <CUSTOM400>? I hope so. I've seen no sign of Callik or my amulet and I need help.
Text: <CUSTOM400>과 함께 온 거요? 그러길 바라오. 칼릭도 내 호신부도 흔적이 없고 도움이 필요하오.

TextEng: I guess I don't have much choice... I can't fight. I suppose it was foolish to risk our lives for it.
Text: 선택의 여지가 없군... 싸울 줄 모르오. 목숨을 걸다니 어리석었나 보오.

TextEng: Very little, I'm afraid. I came here... well... I came here hoping to circumvent the quarantine on Neverwinter.
Text: 안타깝게도 별로 없소. 여기 온 건... 그러니까... 네버윈터 격리를 피하려고 온 거요.

TextEng: If you need, though I don't know if there's anything else I can add.
Text: 필요하다면, 더 보탤 게 있을지 모르겠지만.

TextEng: Wonderful! Snatched from fate and returned to family Masterson! You see, Agnes? We Mastersons get things done!
Text: 훌륭하오! 운명에서 낚아채 마스터슨 가문으로 돌아왔군! 봤소, 아그네스? 우리 마스터슨 가문은 해내는 거요!

TextEng: And I am happy to take it. Here, some gold for your trouble. You may even live to spend it.
Text: 기꺼이 받겠소. 여기, 수고비로 금화를 드리리다. 쓸 때까지 살아있길 바라오.

TextEng: Now, I just have to get out of here. We can't break quarantine, but if we barricade the manor...
Text: 이제 여기서 나가야겠소. 격리를 뚫을 순 없지만, 저택을 방어벽으로 막으면...

TextEng: A... reward. Well, I suppose that would be fair. It's better than not getting it back at all, I guess.
Text: 보... 보상이라. 음, 공정하다고 해야겠지. 아예 못 돌려받는 것보단 나으니까.

TextEng: I will give you 500 gold. I think that is more than sufficient. That Mr. Callik didn't look too tough.
Text: 금화 500개를 드리겠소. 충분하고도 남는다고 생각하오. 그 칼릭 씨가 그리 강해 보이진 않았으니.

TextEng: I... I can't do anything about that... I'm no fighter, as Agnes will attest. I can only ask that you reconsider.
Text: 나... 난 어쩔 도리가 없소... 아그네스도 증언하겠지만 싸울 줄 모르오. 다시 생각해 달라고 부탁할 수밖에 없소.

TextEng: I will be here... I've nowhere else to go, really. I cannot even know if you really have it.
Text: 여기 있겠소... 사실 갈 곳도 없소. 정말로 가지고 있는지조차 알 수 없으니.

TextEng: Yes, that's it. You're joking with your ribald middleclass wit. Very good. Now please... return my amulet when you find it.
Text: 그래, 그거군. 천박한 중산층 유머로 농담하는 거지. 아주 좋소. 이제 제발... 호신부를 찾으면 돌려주시오.

TextEng: You look reasonable, and we <race> folk have to help each another. Here. 500 gold and something from the Masterson armory.
Text: 합리적으로 보이고, 우리 <race> 동족끼리 서로 도와야지. 여기. 금화 500개와 마스터슨 무기고에서 가져온 것이오.

TextEng: I suppose I could be convinced to pay a fair price. Here, take this 500 gold and something from the Masterson armory.
Text: 적정한 가격을 치를 수도 있겠소. 여기, 금화 500개와 마스터슨 무기고에서 가져온 것이오.

TextEng: Here, I'll give you 200 gold. Please, just take it and go.
Text: 여기, 금화 200개를 드리겠소. 제발, 받고 가시오.

TextEng: Allow me to express my thanks, and my relief. Now, if you don't mind, we're off to barricade the manor.
Text: 감사와 안도를 표하겠소. 이제 괜찮다면, 저택을 방어벽으로 막으러 가겠소.

TextEng: I am more that willing to agree that you are worth more but I really don't have much else with me.
Text: 당신이 더 받을 자격이 있다는 데 기꺼이 동의하겠소. 하지만 정말 가진 게 별로 없소.

TextEng: That is debatable, but the point is irrelevant. I don't have much else with me to give you.
Text: 논쟁의 여지가 있지만, 그건 중요하지 않소. 줄 게 별로 없소.

TextEng: Please! There's no point! I don't have much. I don't carry a bank with me! I don't have much more!
Text: 제발! 소용없소! 가진 게 별로 없소. 은행을 들고 다니는 게 아니오! 더 없소!

TextEng: Unless... well... The amulet. I have the amulet. Please, don't make me give it up.
Text: 다만... 그러니까... 호신부가 있소. 호신부는 있소. 제발, 포기하게 하지 마시오.

TextEng: You are NOT helping, dear!
Text: 도움이 안 되오, 여보!

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> I suppose... I guess you might as well take it. I guess it was foolish to risk our lives for it...
Text: <StartCheck>[성공]</Start> 그래... 가져가시오. 목숨을 걸다니 어리석었나 보오...

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> But... no. No, I can't. I may not be an adventurer, and I may not use it, but it's mine!
Text: <StartCheck>[실패]</Start> 하지만... 안 돼. 안 되오. 모험가가 아니고 사용하지 않더라도 내 것이오!

TextEng: The glaring eyes of my wife wish to remind me that she did say the man was not to be trusted, but perhaps he is only delayed.
Text: 아내의 노려보는 눈이 그 남자를 믿으면 안 된다고 했던 걸 상기시켜 주는군. 하지만 아마 늦어지는 것뿐일 거요.

TextEng: I beg of you, please find some measure of kindness within you.
Text: 부탁이오, 제발 자비를 베풀어 주시오.

TextEng: My wife may disagree with my appraisal of him, but he swore he would return.
Text: 아내는 내 평가에 동의하지 않을 수도 있지만, 그는 돌아오겠다고 맹세했소.

TextEng: I mean, he seemed honest. It has only been... a day...
Text: 그러니까, 정직해 보였소. 겨우... 하루밖에...

TextEng: The suspicions of my wife have alarmed me. I would like assurances that he is returning. The amulet is valuable to me, after all.
Text: 아내의 의심이 불안하게 하오. 그가 돌아온다는 확인을 받고 싶소. 어쨌든 그 호신부는 내게 귀중하니까.

TextEng: That is, if I can suffer the glares of my wife. As if losing the Masterson family amulet wasn't enough...
Text: 그러니까, 아내의 눈총을 견딜 수 있다면 말이오. 마스터슨 가문 호신부를 잃은 것도 모자라...

TextEng: I hope... I hope you understand.
Text: 이해해 주시기를... 바라오.

TextEng: Take it then. I will make do...
Text: 그럼 가져가시오. 어떻게든 해보겠소...
